hero_title: Build an Empire, Not a Product.
hero_subtitle: Ekobol is Me the Tech's "thinking code" philosophy. More than a tool that unifies marketplaces; it is an autonomous growth engine designed for you to dominate the digital world.
genesis_title: Genesis Engine: From Idea to Phenomenon
genesis_step1_desc: Connect all your marketplaces. Upload your products. Integrate the raw material into a single central brain.
genesis_step2_desc: Unleash the power of AI. Create perfect visuals, hypnotic descriptions, and unbeatable pricing strategies.
genesis_step3_desc: Watch your empire from a single unified panel. Dominate the market with real-time data and leave your competitors behind.
playground_title: AI Playground: The Power of Creation
playground_subtitle: Witness how an ordinary product transforms into a market phenomenon with Ekobol's artificial intelligence.
playground_desc_content: Rewrite the rules of the street. Designed for urban exploration, the 'Nebula' model combines breathable composite mesh and a reactive foam sole. With every step, don't just walk, flow into the future.
final_cta_subtitle: Stop unifying platforms. Start dominating the market. Discover our flexible plans and lay the foundation of your empire.
automation_nexus_title: EKOBOL COMMAND CENTER: AI AUTOMATION NEXUS
automation_nexus_subtitle: Transform your business processes with Ekobol's AI-powered automation, maximize efficiency, and leave your competitors behind. An interactive experience covering all site capabilities and workflows.
